00036 CLexiconKeyChooser::CLexiconKeyChooser(ListCSwordModuleInfo modules, CSwordKey *key, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00037     : CKeyChooser(modules, key, parent, name), m_key(dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key)){
00038 
00039   setModules(modules, false);
00040     
00041  //we use a layout because the key chooser should be resized to full size
00042     m_layout = new QHBoxLayout(this,QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00043 
00044     m_widget = new CKeyChooserWidget(/*m_modules.first()->entries()*/0, false, this);
00045     m_widget->comboBox()->setMaximumWidth(300); 
00046     m_widget->setToolTips(TT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,TT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, TT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, TT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00047     m_widget->setWhatsThis(WT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,WT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, WT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, WT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00048     
00049     m_layout->addWidget(m_widget,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00050     
00051     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(changed(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00052     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(focusOut(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00053 
00054   setModules(modules, true);
00055 }
00056 
00057 CSwordKey* const CLexiconKeyChooser::key(){
00058 //  qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::key()");
00059     return m_key;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setKey(CSwordKey* key){    
00063 //  qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::setKey(CSwordKey* key)");
00064     if (!(m_key = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key)))
00065         return;     
00066 
00067   QString newKey = m_key->key();
00068     const int index =   m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->index(m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->findItem( newKey ));
00069   m_widget->comboBox()->setCurrentItem(index);  
00070 
00071   emit keyChanged( m_key );
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CLexiconKeyChooser::activated(int index){
00075 //  qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::activated(int index)");
00076     const QString text = m_widget->comboBox()->text(index); 
00077     /*to prevent from eternal loop, because activated()is emitted again*/
00078     if (m_key && m_key->key() != text) {
00079         m_key->key(text);   
00080         setKey(m_key);
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00085 void CLexiconKeyChooser::refreshContent(){
00086   if (m_modules.count() == 1) {
00087     m_widget->reset(m_modules.first()->entries(), 0, true); 
00088   }
00089   else {
00095     typedef QMap<unsigned int, CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*> LexiconMap;
00096     LexiconMap lexiconMap;
00097     for (m_modules.first(); m_modules.current(); m_modules.next()) {
00098       lexiconMap.insert(m_modules.current()->entries()->count(), m_modules.current(), false);
00099     }
00100     for ( LexiconMap::Iterator lex_it = lexiconMap.begin(); lex_it != lexiconMap.end(); ++lex_it ) {
00101       qWarning("%s has %i entries", lex_it.data()->name().latin1(), lex_it.key());
00102     }
00103 
00104     CSwordLexiconModuleInfo* referenceModule = lexiconMap.begin().data();
00105     QStringList entries = QStringList(*(referenceModule->entries()));
00106 
00107     qWarning("step 1");
00108     if (lexiconMap.count() == 1) {
00109       qWarning("ONLY one module!");
00110       m_widget->reset(entries, 0, true);    
00111       return;
00112     };
00113 
00114 
00115     //now see if the entries are in all other modules
00116     QStringList::Iterator it = entries.begin();
00117     LexiconMap::Iterator module;
00118     while (it != entries.end()) {
00119       for ( module = lexiconMap.begin(), ++module; module.data() != referenceModule && module != lexiconMap.end(); ++module ) {
00120         if (!module.data()->entries()->contains(*it)) { //entry is not in the module
00121 //          qWarning((*it).latin1());
00122           it = entries.remove(it);
00123           break; //no need to look into the other modules because we already removed the entry
00124         }
00125         else {
00126           ++it;
00127         }
00128       }
00129     }
00130 
00131     m_widget->reset(entries, 0, true);  
00132   }
00133 }
00134 
00136 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setModules( ListCSwordModuleInfo modules, const bool refresh ) {
00137   m_modules.clear();
00138   for (modules.first(); modules.current(); modules.next()) {
00139     if (CSwordLexiconModuleInfo* lexicon = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(modules.current())) {
00140       m_modules.append(lexicon);
00141     }
00142   }
00143   if (refresh)
00144     refreshContent();
00145 }

00149 }
